title: Mahou no Mako-chan
synopsis: Mako is a young siren and daughter to the King of the Sea. In a stormy day she rescues the young sport Akira from a wrecked ship, but ends up falling in love with him. So, with help from the Witch of the Sea, she's transformed into a human, and becomes a highschool student who helps everyone with her strong sense of love and justice and her magical pendant, the "Tear of the Mermaid."
staff: [['Nishizawa, Nobutaka', ['Episode Director']], ['Horie, Mitsuko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Araki, Shingo', ['Animation Director']], ['Yukimuro, Shunichi', ['Screenplay']]]
